_xResult.title: Fiona Linen Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made summer maxi dress with three-quarter sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
Ideals, ideals, ideals. As we head farther into the twenty-first century, it seems there are more and more standards to conform to. From all around you, external or internal, there they are. It begs for a modern-day, age-defying, simplistic way of facing the moderrn world.

 

Be authentically you in this one-of-a-kind, hand-crafted maxi dress from Aiste. Less work, thanks to the dirt-repelling linen and wrinkle-resistant fabric, this dress lets you focus on the most important aspect: yourself.

 

Aiste says "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics."

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
